Ship from China to Kenya — Fast, Safe & Affordable

We help Kenyans source, ship and import electronics, phones, furniture, cameras and more from China with verified suppliers and guaranteed delivery.

Our Services
Pre-order

Shipping Perks

exceptional shipping services 24/7

Money Back Guarantee

Get value for your products

Customer Service

exceptional customer services

Cost effective sourcing solutions

thorough testing, fast dispatch

What We Offer

Nilo Logistics specializes in reliable and efficient shipping from China to Kenya. We handle a diverse range of cargo, including high-end electronics, cameras, furniture, and mobile phones, ensuring they reach Kenyan clients safely and on time.

100%

Reliable Departures

100%

On-time Delivery

100%

Cost-Effective Solutions

100%

Secure Handling

Our Services

1. International Shipping (China → Kenya)

We ship goods from China to Kenya via Air Freight and Sea Freight. Suitable for electronics, phones, cameras, furniture, and bulk commercial cargo.

Get Shipping Quote

🟦 2. Sea Freight (Bulk Shipping)

Best option for large, heavy, or bulk shipments at the lowest cost.

Details:

  • Delivery time: 35 – 40 days
  • Rate: KES 65,000 per cubic meter (CBM)
  • Ideal for furniture, wholesale electronics & commercial goods
Get a Quote

Air Freight (Fast Delivery)

Fast delivery for phones, electronics, cameras, and urgent shipments.

Rates:

  • Normal goods: Starting from KES 13.5 per KG
  • Dangerous goods: Special handling required
Get Shipping Quote

4. Product Sourcing (China)

We help you find reliable factories, verify suppliers, negotiate prices, and ship safely to Kenya.

Includes:

  • Supplier verification
  • Factory inspection
  • Price negotiation
  • Quality control
  • Consolidation
Start Sourcing

Why Choose Us?

Reliable China Sourcing

We connect you to trusted suppliers and ensure you get the best value for your money.

Quality Assurance on Every Device

Every product is tested before shipping to guarantee performance and durability

Quality Assurance on Every Device

Every product is tested before shipping to guarantee performance and durability

Fast Dispatch & Smooth Logistics

With our efficient sea and air shipment options, your products arrive on time, every time.

Flexible Wholesale Options

Order from as low as one unit or get even better deals when buying in bulk.

Expert Handling & Risk Mitigation

Our sourcing fee covers the deep expertise, verification, and compliance checks that keep your business safe.

TESTIMONIALS

What Our Clients Say

We’ve helped individuals and businesses across Kenya source and ship products from China with confidence. Here’s what some of our clients have to say about working with Nilo Logistics.

4.8

Average Customer Rating

  • “I was skeptical about importing iPhones, but Nilo Logistics handled everything. The iPhone 12 I received was in perfect condition, and the warranty gave me total peace of mind!”
    Kevin O.
    Nairobi, Kenya
  • “As a reseller, margins are everything. Sourcing directly through Nilo saved me 30% compared to local wholesalers. Highly recommended!”
    Sarah W.
    Eldoret, Kenya
  • “Their sea shipping is organized and reliable. My office furniture arrived safely and the sourcing team kept me updated at every step. Truly professional.”
    David M.,
    Nakuru, Kenya
